SELECT BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, BRDMEMO, BRDDATE, BRDCNT FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BRDNO = #{brdno}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD ( BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, BRDMEMO, BRDDATE, BRDCNT, BRDDELETEFLAG ) VALUES ( BRDNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{brdtitle}, #{brdwriter}, #{brdmemo}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{brdcnt}, 'N' )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARD SET BRDDELETEFLAG = 'Y' WHERE BRDNO = #{brdno}
